title: Regenerative Pain Treatments
description: Our biologic therapies repair tissue, reduce pain, and keep you out of the operating theatre.
longDescription: Every treatment at Dr. SNA Clinic is designed to activate your body’s own healing power. From platelet-rich plasma to advanced cellular therapies, we combine orthopaedic expertise, ultrasound guidance, and tailored rehab so results are measurable and long-lasting.

seo.metaTitle: Regenerative Pain Treatments London | PRP, BMAC, Adipose & Arthrosamid | Dr. SNA
seo.metaDescription: Explore PRP, BMAC, adipose cell therapy, Arthrosamid®, and non-surgical regenerative pain treatments in London. Consultant-led orthobiologics that heal from within.

hero.headline: Regenerative Medicine That Keeps You Moving
hero.subheadline: Injectable biologics and supportive therapies that target pain at its source.

introduction.title: Why Patients Choose Non-Surgical Regeneration
introduction.content: Your joints deserve more than temporary relief. We harness growth factors, stem cells, hydrogel cushioned injections, and targeted physiotherapy to restore mobility without downtime. Each protocol is personalised after imaging, lab work, and movement analysis.

treatmentCategories.title: Biologic Injections
treatmentCategories.description: Regenerative injectables that rebuild tissue and calm inflammation.

treatmentCategories.title: Stabilisation & Cushioning
treatmentCategories.description: Long-lasting cushioning and supportive therapies for arthritic joints.

platelet-rich-plasma.title: Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP)
platelet-rich-plasma.shortDescription: Concentrated growth factors heal tendons, ligaments, and joints.
platelet-rich-plasma.description: Triple-spin PRP delivers high platelet counts directly to injured tissue, accelerating repair and reducing pain.

adipose-cell-therapy.title: Adipose Cell Therapy
adipose-cell-therapy.shortDescription: Micro-fragmented fat injectables to cushion and regenerate joints.
adipose-cell-therapy.description: Adipose tissue provides cushioning cells and anti-inflammatory factors that stabilise arthritic joints.
benefits: Ideal for knees, hips, and ankles

bmac-therapy.title: Bone Marrow Aspirate Concentrate (BMAC)
bmac-therapy.shortDescription: Concentrated marrow-derived cells for advanced cartilage and tendon repair.
bmac-therapy.description: BMAC delivers stem-cell-rich concentrate to severe joint or tendon injuries when PRP alone isn’t enough.

arthrosamid-injection.title: Arthrosamid® Hydrogel
arthrosamid-injection.shortDescription: A single hydrogel injection that cushions arthritic knees for years.
arthrosamid-injection.description: Arthrosamid® integrates into the synovial lining, providing long-term lubrication and shock absorption for painful knees.
benefits: Ideal for moderate to severe OA

physiotherapy.title: Specialist Physiotherapy
physiotherapy.shortDescription: Rehab that protects regenerative gains and builds lasting strength.
physiotherapy.description: Tailored loading, mobility, and posture programmes that sync with your injection plan.

non-surgical-regenerative.title: Non-Surgical Regenerative Programme
non-surgical-regenerative.shortDescription: Comprehensive plans combining diagnostics, injections, and rehab.
non-surgical-regenerative.description: For complex cases we design hybrid programmes blending multiple biologics, physiotherapy, and lifestyle coaching.
